__e: You know, I got to tell you, Sister... until I met you, I'd always thought nuns were a bunch of old maids... that had always just given up on life.
I believe it too, but what if they're not nuns?
It was sad, as he was a priest and the nuns didn't understand him.
The nuns always took good care of me when Papa was away to hunt horrible criminals
Now, I suggest you go find the priest go find the nuns, pack your things and prepare to move.
When I was a kid, I never drank because I thought it was a sin,... ..because of the nuns and everything.
I don't think one looks properly at nuns, or priests.
